name: Vovô Tiâo
description: How can we always be happier? This question was sent to the creation of Grandpa Tiao. Eventually, we returned a ball that fell in our yard, took a kite out of some tree, taught the little ones how to ride a bike, showed them how card games are and how the world works. The Grandpa Tião is a mobile device that has mini-games inserted for the situations, contributes to the well-being of our children in and out of the game. Call your friends, the ranking's competitiveness and the sharing codes allowed to create a community engaged in favor of our little ones. When watching the advertisements, the value of the fund will be donated to charities. Perfect for fun and still breaking, contribute to the future of our species.
